short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn browsing ideas into creative media AI generation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
VaroChrome integrates Varoriya AI seamlessly into your browsing experience, offering powerful tools to transform images effortlessly. Explore creative possibilities with intuitive context menu options:

- Create Prompt from  Image: Generate AI prompts from selected images.
- Generate Image from Prompt (Selected Text).
- Send as Target: Set Target image for Styles-Transfer.
- Send as Style: Apply image styles for Styles-Transfer..
- UpScale: Enhance image resolution using advanced AI algorithms.
- Illusion Guide: Discover visual effects and illusions.
- View Profile: Access your Varoriya account details directly.
- View Creation: Explore your AI Generated Images/Media.
- Connect Varoriya : Connect with Varoriya AI for updates and more.
